gg.al.graphics.renderer

Class CharacterRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gg.al.graphics.renderer.CharacterRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderComponent.RenderDelegate

    public class CharacterRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements RenderComponent.RenderDelegate
    Created by Thomas Neumann on 29.05.2017.
    Renderer for Character entities.
    Also contains health bar and resource bar rendering for the Character

      • process

        public void process(int entityId,
                    RenderSystem renderSystem)
        Updates the Character Decal, and uses the currently set animation from the RenderComponent.
        Also redraws the health and resource bars, and updates their position accordingly.
        Specified by:
        process in interface RenderComponent.RenderDelegate
        Parameters:
        entityId - the Character entity id
        renderSystem - the delegating RenderSystem
